about_the_game:
Sealed Gate is an exciting pixel 2D MMORPG game with sandbox elements, where players can plunge into a fascinating world of fantasy adventures and unique opportunities. In this game you will be able to explore a huge open world, complete quests, fight monsters and create your own guilds.

Events And Seasonal Events

Seasonal events related to the real calendar, such as Halloween or New Year's Eve.

Dynamic events in the world, such as monster attacks on cities or natural disasters that require players to join forces to defend or rebuild.

Achievements

The introduction of an achievement system with rewards for exploring the world, crafting achievements, combat exploits and social interactions.

Crafting

Specialization in crafting, which allows players to become masters in certain fields, for example, blacksmithing, alchemy, construction.

Rare recipes and materials that can only be found in dangerous locations or received as rewards for tasks and events.

Interactive Environment

The effect of time of day and weather on gameplay: certain creatures can only appear at night or during rain, some plants can only grow in certain seasons.

The Ability To Change The World

Players can build their own houses, guild locations, and influence the ecosystem and economy of the game world.

Deep Social Integration

A mentoring system that allows experienced players to help newcomers, receiving unique rewards for this.

Guild tasks and events that promote cooperation and competition between guilds.

Character Personalization

Advanced customization options for characters, including appearance, equipment, and even fighting style.

A pet system where players can tame and train various creatures to help in battle or as companions.

Tasks

Interactive and branching quests with multiple solutions and outcomes depending on the player's choices.

Quests with a deep plot involving players in the history of the world and its inhabitants.
